articles.title: ‘Mean Girls’ Won’t Return to Broadway - The New York Times
articles.description: Adapted by Tina Fey from her 2004 film, the musical played 834 performances. A national tour is expected to resume when theaters reopen.
articles.content:
The coronavirus pandemic has felled another Broadway show: Mean Girls.
The musicals producers, led by Lorne Michaels of Saturday Night Live, announced on Thursday that they would not seek to reopen … [+824 chars]
